hm.binkley.util.function

Interface ThrowingBiConsumer<T,U,E extends Exception>

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ThrowingBiConsumer<T,U,E extends Exception>
    ThrowingBiConsumer is a throwing look-a=like of BiConsumer. It cannot be a BiConsumer as it takes throwing versions of bi-consumers. Otherwise it is a faithful reproduction.
    Author:
    B. K. Oxley (binkley)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods
